SELECT SI_KENSHIN.SI_KENSHIN_ID ,
SI_KENSHIN.MS_SENIN_ID ,
SI_KENSHIN.MS_SI_OPTIONS_ID , SI_KENSHIN.KENSA_NAME , SI_KENSHIN.KENSA_DAY , SI_KENSHIN.EXPIRY_DATE , SI_KENSHIN.HOSPITAL , SI_KENSHIN.DIAGNOSIS , SI_KENSHIN.RESULTS , SI_KENSHIN.REMARKS ,
SI_KENSHIN.DELETE_FLAG , SI_KENSHIN.SEND_FLAG , SI_KENSHIN.VESSEL_ID , SI_KENSHIN.DATA_NO , SI_KENSHIN.USER_KEY , SI_KENSHIN.RENEW_DATE , SI_KENSHIN.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_KENSHIN.TS
FROM SI_KENSHIN

INSERT INTO SI_KENSHIN( SI_KENSHIN_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID ,
MS_SI_OPTIONS_ID , KENSA_NAME , HOSPITAL , KENSA_DAY , EXPIRY_DATE , DIAGNOSIS , RESULTS , REMARKS ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_KENSHIN_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID ,
:MS_SI_OPTIONS_ID , :KENSA_NAME , :HOSPITAL , :KENSA_DAY , :EXPIRY_DATE , :DIAGNOSIS , :RESULTS , :REMARKS ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_KENSHIN SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID ,
MS_SI_OPTIONS_ID = :MS_SI_OPTIONS_ID , KENSA_NAME = :KENSA_NAME , HOSPITAL = :HOSPITAL , KENSA_DAY = :KENSA_DAY , EXPIRY_DATE = :EXPIRY_DATE , DIAGNOSIS = :DIAGNOSIS , RESULTS = :RESULTS , REMARKS = :REMARKS ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_KENSHIN_ID = :SI_KENSHIN_ID AND TS = :TS
